text: hi I'm Sarah and I'm going to tell you
about my home town back in Canada my
city is called berry so Berry is a
smaller city it is a city but it's quite
small I think maybe one hundred thousand
people and the best thing about berry is
that it was built around Big Lake
so the lake in the summertime always has
festivals around it when it's hot you
can go down to the beach if you like
fishing you can go fishing there's
always a lot going on around the lake in
the wintertime it gets really really
cold the snow sometimes up to here you
need a snow blower the thing that you
push that pushes all the snow out of the
way unless you want to just stand out
there shoveling and looking stupid while
your neighbor does his in five minutes
Berry is also really close to Toronto so
Toronto brings a lot of people in
because there's a lot of work in Toronto
but Toronto is really expensive to live
in so many many people live in Barrie
where it's cheap to live and then drive
to Toronto or they take the bus to
Toronto every day to go to work my dad
does this so it's much cheaper to live
in Barrie much easier to work in Toronto
so where is the best place to live if
you're going to work in Toronto so
that's my hometown I hope you enjoyed it
